documents.document: I will persevere with Santa Clarita diet because it's providing me with access to Timothy Olyphant.
@CiaraAllenMUA she started properly cleansing her skin after you performed your intervention.
@ItsCherrySue @CiaraAllenMUA I should add that she was dealing with a mother of the bride who turned up to the chair in full make up! Saint.
Everything Ciara Allen does reminds me why I asked her to do my wedding make up. If you want somebody who knows theâ€¦ https://t.co/CJYtAvxZAc
@neasaconneally he just did a little 1 min piece to camera..I was flicking channels ðŸ˜—
@neasaconneally his little talk piece on the free porridge on this weeks Operation Transformation ðŸ’—
@neasaconneally a bit of mindfulness & yoga is insufficient when you feel study/work is insurmountable. You need somebody who's been there.
@neasaconneally my parents were great & had a great group of friends + Prof O'Shea took it upon himself to settle our nerves!
Great initiative from @AMSI_Ireland medical students need to be able to talk about their mental health & issues sucâ€¦ https://t.co/TIoOfs1IUC
@neasaconneally @nankhunda a lot of stress & a break up during my finals & I really needed somebody experienced to say 'you can do this'
@neasaconneally @nankhunda ðŸ’— totally agree that a formal mentorship programme would be invaluable to students. I remember going through
@ellenmcoyne this is a huge concern of mine & amongst other Doctors:that women will defer seeking necessary treatment, risking their health.
I'm so grateful for all the wonderful friends I've made from going on first dates over the years. Wait, no. #FirstDatesIRL
Dublin is not the only county.
'Where's Louth?' Oh my God are you serious. #FirstDatesIRL
You're not 31. Come on now. #firstdates
@Heneyman thank you Seamus, that means a lot!
Checking in with tonight's 9 pm headlines. Ciaran Mullooly carrying the main story. Ok, it's safe to proceed.
@EoinKr thanks Eoin!
@_Illusionary_ thanks Amy! x
@ItsCherrySue thank you Sue!
@stevemur67 thanks v much Stephen
@lacanlune thanks v much Marie
@Lorrrrrrrrraine thanks Lorraine!
@ShinnersCro can I just smell your wine? Just so I can remember the good times.
@nankhunda thanks Naomi! X
@incogellen this is going to be a sly baby, will sleep with one eye open.
@alan_maguire thank you Sir.
@AidanCoughlan thanks Aidan, it's all a bit mad but good so far these last few months!
@ChristineBohan ha thanks Christine! The Queen showed me the light & the way.
@urchinette thanks Anna! It's helping me cope with the world right now!
@Antcon7062 thanks Anthony!
@neasaconneally please let the babies save us all.
@SarahJayBee thank you! Feeling very good thanks to lots of self care & ignoring parenting manuals.
@Eireinthecity ðŸ˜‚ I did all the hard work!
@SarahJayBee our family shall be growing by 1 only though! (Thankfully)
Please let me share a due date with BeyoncÃ©.
@jeannedesutun I remember having arches once upon a time.
Demonstrates points of concern I raised in this weeks @med_indonews re: confidentiality for women who fear disclosiâ€¦ https://t.co/OXRbaVVneQ
Absolutely fake news. https://t.co/V0o9noHI9m
@Lorrrrrrrrraine always something to clean around the house.
@Lorrrrrrrrraine I just have to sit down & write. Easy really ðŸ˜
List of things I'm going to write about next month: why you don't need that expensive test, why you do need this test, contraception myths.
Notion that Enda Kenny is going to head to Washington & use an Irish wink & a nod to convince Trump of the error of his ways is laughable.
Basically this is a planned coup & we haven't seen anything yet.
Just read an article on Trump regime & the events of last few days & how it wasn't pure ignorance but a deliberate attempt to provoke us.
Jehovah's Witness knocking on the door on a Sunday afternoon. Sorry guys, I'm not your gal.
@Antcon7062 @neasaconneally (Given that 1 & 2 are an amalgamation of Trainspotting & Porno) He's an arts critic like?
@Antcon7062 @neasaconneally pretty sure Danny Boyle isn't interested in a third & there's no real material for it.
@neasaconneally even Leo would be embarrassed with that. He's out of Health now & won't want the attention..until he does of course.
It's not you, it's me. I just don't have the time. I follow some excellent people on Twitter & I have only so many things to say.
You can block people because Twitter isn't a model of how you communicate with people in real life & you shouldn't have to explain that.
@neasaconneally this is very true. Afraid that we may have to endure 4 years of 'but it's just a stunt!' & being told not to overreact.
@neasaconneally God love Nadine O'Regan trying to balance out 'this is a film about male menopause/nobody cares about middle aged white men'
Please don't follow me to question me then trawl through my TL liking tweets from months ago.
"It was so clever of Danny Boyle to set Trainspotting in Edinburgh, an uptight, Calvinistic city" The book was set in Edinburgh dude #marian
Chilling. "I wish somebody would grab his phone. But it seems to take the pressâ€™s mind off what heâ€™s really doing.â€ https://t.co/OvBHjLYz5l
I actually love reading about fashion choices & symbolism re same but I think Theresa is awful so I'd prefer to see that being addressed.
Must be frustrating to write 'What do Theresa's/Melania's clothes say about her' pieces when you want to write about the world being on fire
@AidanCoughlan she's had a good run on it so far, > 10 yrs & this is where we are.
This 'should we feel sorry for Melania?' thing is really weird & twisted. This is not really the moral dilemma of our times right now.

@neasaconneally @med_indonews thanks Neasa!
@Antcon7062 @NewstalkFM you couldn't. It's incredible. I doubt he'd acknowledge this.
@Lorrrrrrrrraine of course it would. I have patients coming in asking whether it's safe to give based on what they're hearing on radio.

@ShinnersCro thanks Sinead, I needed the gingerman afterwards to soothe my nerves!
Clear guidelines on postnatal contraception from @FSRH_UK Women should be be informed during antenatal & postnatalâ€¦ https://t.co/c5uGZg9Vja

I've been writing again. In this weeks @med_indonews https://t.co/S4VQ0zskeB
Great piece, with @ShinnersCro providing a female GP voice! https://t.co/8k6G92wHOI
Disclaimer: I love my Mam & she bears no likeness to Katie Hopkins.
Katie Hopkins does a thing that my Mam does when trying to get a point she knows is weak across: mimics the voice of a little girl. So odd.
@louisemcsharry standard day to be honest!
@schmorla @neasaconneally so it's in no way a reliable assessment of fertility or infertility so.
@schmorla @neasaconneally with semen analysis? No, there isn't.
It's so important to go for your smear test. It's free & it could save your life. Don't let anything put you off!â€¦ https://t.co/OtpYuf5WB4
@neasaconneally I didn't think of that! Ok, let's go.
@neasaconneally but the eggs Neasa, the eggs!
You can't use the 'knowledge is power' mantra to sell everything. Fertility can't be just assessed by one test. It's not a simple checklist.
'Get X test so you can plan ahead' Will it help you reliably plan ahead? Or will it just create uncertainty & worry?
Odd that women are now being sold at home fertility testing kits with not much discussion about male fertility.
Wider Racial Gap Found in Cervical Cancer Deaths https://t.co/CRpITV45zL
@keelinodonoghue Thoughts on at home 'fertility testing' kits? Causing more worry than providing reassurance?! https://t.co/8gCZPa8zle
@theeney oh I must track that down! She's excellent.
Cartriona Perry's report from Washington re Trump & his teams 'alternative facts' on this evenings news was ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥
'ALTERNATIVE FACTS' https://t.co/XZDm6P2WWm
@neasaconneally exactly! Can't say that I wasn't relieved when it finished as was so intense, musical score was unsettling (in a good way)
@Claredaisy if a man on the TV implies you did, you did.
Not bothered to read pieces that will basically be summarized as 'hysterical women' Donald Trump is POTUS. We know what hysterical means.
@jeannedesutun totally, she's a woman, I thought that was the only loose requirement re ethos of the March.
'But the women who marched don't represent ALL women!' Some of the reactions to yesterday's #WomensMarch are predictably basic.
The whole 'well if Madonna is your spokesperson your movement is invalid etc' Nobody elected Madonna as leader of anything. Calm down.
@neasaconneally maybe it's just my privilege but I didn't really imagine it was ever going to be a searing take on world politics right now.
@neasaconneally if you don't like it fine, but I wouldn't waste a 500 word piece on why Ryan Gosling's character is the worst.
